backend/main.mo: Main actor defining ParanormalCase data types (phenomena types, investigation statuses) and functions for submitting, retrieving, filtering, and updating paranormal investigation cases with blob storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the footer text update in Layout.tsx to change 'Serving Oklahoma Since 2025' to 'Founded in Oklahoma, 2025' with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files emphasizing Oklahoma-specific branding, paranormal investigation features, and dark theme styling throughout the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with paranormal-themed color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Oklahoma Paranormal Investigations - Spectral Investigations' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, submit case, case gallery, case detail, and resources pages, wrapped with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component with sticky header featuring Spectral Investigations logo and 'Oklahoma's Paranormal Investigators' tagline, responsive navigation, and footer displaying 'Founded in Oklahoma, 2025'.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated actors with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication providing login, logout, identity state management, and authentication status tracking with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating paranormal case data, including queries for all cases, filtering by type/location, getting case by ID, and mutations for submitting cases and updating case status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using a paranormal-inspired color palette (purples, greens, deep blues) and utility classes for glowing text effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetail.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single paranormal case including location, phenomena type, status, description, contact info, and photo with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CaseGallery.tsx: Displays a filterable gallery of paranormal cases from Oklahoma with filters for phenomena type and location, showing case cards with status badges and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with background image, service cards for different paranormal phenomena types, and feature highlights for the Oklahoma-based investigation service.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Educational resource page documenting paranormal phenomena types, investigation equipment descriptions and usage, and documentation best practices using tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitCase.tsx: Case submission form page for reporting Oklahoma paranormal activity with fields for location, phenomena type, description, contact info, and optional photo upload with progress tracking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme (ethereal, midnight themes), typography, animations, and design tokens for the paranormal investigation site's dark atmospheric aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features for an Oklahoma-only paranormal investigation website founded in 2025, including home page, case submission, gallery, resources, and themed visual design.
